title: Google\Cloud\NetworkManagement\V1\Step
name: Step
description:
A simulated forwarding path is composed of multiple steps.

Each step has a well-defined state and an associated configuration.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.networkmanagement.v1.Step

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.description
params.description: A description of the step. Usually this is a summary of the state.

params.name: data.state
params.description: Each step is in one of the pre-defined states.

params.name: data.causes_drop
params.description: This is a step that leads to the final state Drop.

params.name: data.project_id
params.description: Project ID that contains the configuration this step is validating.

params.name: data.instance
params.description: Display information of a Compute Engine instance.

params.name: data.firewall
params.description: Display information of a Compute Engine firewall rule.

params.name: data.route
params.description: Display information of a Compute Engine route.

params.name: data.endpoint
params.description: Display information of the source and destination under analysis. The endpoint information in an intermediate state may differ with the initial input, as it might be modified by state like NAT, or Connection Proxy.

params.name: data.forwarding_rule
params.description: Display information of a Compute Engine forwarding rule.

params.name: data.vpn_gateway
params.description: Display information of a Compute Engine VPN gateway.

params.name: data.vpn_tunnel
params.description: Display information of a Compute Engine VPN tunnel.

params.name: data.deliver
params.description: Display information of the final state "deliver" and reason.

params.name: data.forward
params.description: Display information of the final state "forward" and reason.

params.name: data.abort
params.description: Display information of the final state "abort" and reason.

params.name: data.drop
params.description: Display information of the final state "drop" and reason.

params.name: data.load_balancer
params.description: Display information of the load balancers.

params.name: data.network
params.description: Display information of a Google Cloud network.

params.name: data.gke_master
params.description: Display information of a Google Kubernetes Engine cluster master.

params.name: data.cloud_sql_instance
params.description: Display information of a Cloud SQL instance.
